attributes.action: Act like the prime minister of a leading government in essence take control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was amazed to see the Mr Brown has asked the fuel companies to reduce pump prices!Why is he surprised that when you privatise a monopoly/ies this is exactly what you get abuse of the system and the most vulnerable as always suffer and what does Mr Brown do?nothing he "asks"
Mr Brown a little advise from me appeasement has been showed to have failed as it has again in this case!take charge threaten them reduce prices or I will renationalise without compensation or a very excessively heavy penalty windfall tax!nice people get trod on.I must say that I have always been a labour supporter never again!my friend who was a card carrying member has sent his card back and im sure so will many others before its too late pull your finger out and do what your paid a lot of money to do govern!!!!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
